computeEntropy

public static double computeEntropy(int pos,
                                    int neg)
Computes the entropy of two numbers.

Parameters:
pos - number of "positive" instances
neg - number of "negative" instances
Returns:
the entropy as defined as -P(pos) * log2(P(pos)) - P(neg) * log2(P(neg))

computeEntropy

public static double computeEntropy(int[] values)
Computes the entropy of N numbers.

Parameters:
values - numbers from which to compute entropy
Returns:
the entropy as defined as Sum(-P(values[i])) * log2(P(values[i])))

rate - The rate in units per millis.
places - The number of places to show with the rate.

parseBytes

public static final long parseBytes(java.lang.String kbString)
Given a string of the form xY, where x is a number and Y is
  • -- if x is in bytes.
  • B -- if x is in bytes.
  • K -- if x is in kilobytes.
  • M -- if x is in megabytes.
  • G -- if x is in gigabytes.
  • T -- if x is in terabytes.
Return the number of bytes represented.

Returns:
the number of bytes parsed from the string or -1 if malformed.
